author: holgerd77
content:
Hi everyone, I've worked on a new protocol site during the last weeks (mentally long in the making ðŸ˜‹), intended to close some "experience gap" on the Ethereum protocol:

Hope it's helpful for community members and core devs alike, you can expect weekly updates from now on (site is meant to be a bit complementary to forkcast.org).
